mapper.select: SELECT ro.`id` ro_id,re.`id` re_id,ro.`role`,ro.`desc`,re.`name`,re.`url`,re.`permission`,re.`type`,re.`parent_id`,re.`parent_ids` FROM role ro LEFT JOIN role_resource rr ON ro.`id`=rr.`role_id` LEFT JOIN resource re ON rr.`resource_id`=re.`id`

SELECT r.`id` r_id,res.`id` res_id,r.role,res.name,res.permission FROM USER u , role r,resource res, user_role ur,role_resource rr WHERE u.id=ur.user_id AND r.id=ur.role_id AND r.id=rr.role_id AND res.id=rr.resource_id AND u.username=#{username}
mapper.delete: delete from role_resource where role_id=#{roleId} and resource_id=#{resourceId}
